title: Who's Next For Celebrity Box Match
itunes:title: Who's Next For Celebrity Box Match
description:
Today on the show while Charlamagne was away Envy and Yee opened up the phone lines to see who our listeners would like to see in a celebrity box match after Lil Baby made the comment that he would like to set up some over the weekend. Also, they opened up the phone lines to see who our listeners would like to nominate as "Donkey of the Day" and lastly they took calls from listeners who had unfortunate diarrhea stories after a show stopped production because the staff had explosive diarrhea.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
